verses.verse: וַיּוֹצִאֵ֗נִי <S%H3318><s%> Then he brought me forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2435><s%> into the utter הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way toward דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the north וַיְבִאֵ֣נִי <S%H935><s%> and he brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַלִּשְׁכָּ֗ה <S%H3957><s%> me into the chamber אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נֶ֧גֶד <S%H5048><s%> opposite הַגִּזְרָ֛ה <S%H1508><s%> that [was] over against the separate place וַאֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> and opposite הַבִּנְיָ֖ן <S%H1146><s%> and which [was] before the building אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> toward the north אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> accept

אֹ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H753><s%> the length אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits הַמֵּאָ֔ה <S%H3967><s%> of an hundred פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> door הַצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> [was] the north וְהָרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> and the breadth חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> [was] fifty אַמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Opposite הָֽעֶשְׂרִ֗ים <S%H6242><s%> Over against the twenty אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which לֶחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִ֔י <S%H6442><s%> [cubits] which [were] for the inner וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> and opposite רִֽצְפָ֔ה <S%H7531><s%> and over against the pavement אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֶחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִֽיצוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2435><s%> which [was] for the utter אַתִּ֥יק <S%H862><s%> [was] gallery אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> against אַתִּ֖יק <S%H862><s%> gallery בַּשְּׁלִשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7992><s%> in three

וְלִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> And before הַלְּשָׁכ֜וֹת <S%H3957><s%> the chambers מַהֲלַךְ֩ <S%H4109><s%> [was] a walk עֶ֨שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> of ten אַמּ֥וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits רֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> breadth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> an הַפְּנִימִ֔ית <S%H6442><s%> inward דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> a way אַמָּ֣ה <S%H520><s%> cubit אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> of one וּפִתְחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6607><s%> and their doors לַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> toward the north

וְהַלְּשָׁכ֥וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הָעֶלְיוֹנֹ֖ת <S%H5945><s%> Now the upper קְצֻר֑וֹת <S%H7114><s%> [were] shorter כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because יוֹכְל֨וּ <S%H3201><s%> for אַתִּיקִ֜ים <S%H862><s%> for the galleries מֵהֵ֗נָה <S%H2007><s%> than these מֵֽהַתַּחְתֹּנ֛וֹת <S%H8481><s%> than the lower וּמֵהַתִּֽכֹנ֖וֹת <S%H8484><s%> and than the middlemost בִּנְיָֽן׃ <S%H1146><s%> of the building

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מְשֻׁלָּשׁוֹת֙ <S%H8027><s%> For they [were] in three הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> and had לָהֶן֙ עַמּוּדִ֔ים <S%H5982><s%> [stories] but had not pillars כְּעַמּוּדֵ֖י <S%H5982><s%> as the pillars הַחֲצֵר֑וֹת <S%H2691><s%> of the courts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that נֶאֱצַ֗ל <S%H680><s%> therefore [the building] was straitened מֵהַתַּחְתּוֹנ֛וֹת <S%H8481><s%> more than the lowest וּמֵהַתִּֽיכֹנ֖וֹת <S%H8484><s%> and the middlemost מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> from the ground

וְגָדֵ֤ר <S%H1447><s%> And the wall אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> for לַחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> that [was] without לְעֻמַּ֣ת <S%H5980><s%> over against הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <S%H3957><s%> the chambers דֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִֽצוֹנָ֖ה <S%H2435><s%> the utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> on the forepart הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <S%H3957><s%> of the chambers אָרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H753><s%> the length חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> thereof [was] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֹ֣רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> For the length הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <S%H3957><s%> of the chambers אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which לֶחָצֵ֥ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִֽצוֹנָ֖ה <S%H2435><s%> that [were] in the utter חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> [was] fifty אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and lo before הַהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> [were] an hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

[וּמִתַּחֲתָה כ] [לְּשָׁכֹות כ] (וּמִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash ק) (הַלְּשָׁכֹ֣ות <S%H3957><s%> chamber ק) הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these [הַמָּבֹוא כ] (הַמֵּבִיא֙ <S%H3996><s%> entry ק) מֵֽהַקָּדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> on the east side בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> as one goeth לָהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> into them מֵֽהֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִצֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2435><s%> from the utter

בְּרֹ֣חַב ׀ <S%H7341><s%> [were] in the thickness גֶּ֣דֶר <S%H1444><s%> of the wall הֶחָצֵ֗ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court דֶּ֧רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַקָּדִ֛ים <S%H6921><s%> the east אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over פְּנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> over against הַגִּזְרָ֛ה <S%H1508><s%> the separate place וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and over against הַבִּנְיָ֖ן <S%H1146><s%> the building לְשָׁכֽוֹת׃ <S%H3957><s%> The chambers

וְדֶ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> And the way לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <S%H4758><s%> them [was] like the appearance הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <S%H3957><s%> of the chambers אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> which [were] toward הַצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the north כְּאָרְכָּ֖ן <S%H753><s%> as long as כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so רָחְבָּ֑ן <S%H7341><s%> was their width וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all מוֹצָ֣אֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H4161><s%> they and all their goings out וּכְמִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H4941><s%> [were] both according to their fashions וּכְפִתְחֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H6607><s%> and according to their doors

וּכְפִתְחֵ֣י <S%H6607><s%> And according to the doors הַלְּשָׁכ֗וֹת <S%H3957><s%> of the chambers אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> that [were] toward הַדָּר֔וֹם <S%H1864><s%> the south פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [was] a door בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the head דָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> of the way דֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [even] the way בִּפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before הַגְּדֶ֣רֶת <S%H1448><s%> the wall הֲגִינָ֔ה <S%H1903><s%> directly דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַקָּדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> the east בְּבוֹאָֽן׃ <S%H935><s%> as one entereth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about לִֽשְׁכ֨וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הַצָּפ֜וֹן <S%H6828><s%> he unto me The north לִֽשְׁכ֣וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הַדָּרוֹם֮ <S%H1864><s%> [and] the south אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [are] before הַגִּזְרָה֒ <S%H1508><s%> the separate place הֵ֣נָּה ׀ <S%H2007><s%> in לִֽשְׁכ֣וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> they [be] holy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יֹאכְלוּ־ <S%H398><s%> shall eat שָׁ֧ם <S%H8033><s%> There הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> where the priests אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who קְרוֹבִ֥ים <S%H7138><s%> that approach לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy things שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> There יַנִּ֣יחוּ ׀ <S%H3240><s%> there shall they lay קָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H6944><s%> holy things וְהַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering וְהַחַטָּ֣את <S%H2403><s%> and the sin offering וְהָאָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> and the trespass offering כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> for the place קָדֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H6918><s%> [is] holy

בְּבֹאָ֣ם <S%H935><s%> enter הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> When the priests וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> therein then shall they not go out מֵהַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֶחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַחִיצוֹנָ֔ה <S%H2435><s%> [place] into the utter וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> there יַנִּ֧יחוּ <S%H3240><s%> but there they shall lay בִגְדֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H899><s%> their garments אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְשָׁרְת֥וּ <S%H8334><s%> wherein they minister בָהֶ֖ן כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for they [are] holy הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2007><s%> in [יִלְבְּשׁוּ כ] (וְלָבְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> apparel ק) בְּגָדִ֣ים <S%H899><s%> garments אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> on other וְקָרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> and shall approach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> to [those things] which [are] for the people

וְכִלָּ֗ה <S%H3615><s%> Now when he had made an end אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִדּוֹת֙ <S%H4060><s%> of measuring הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house הַפְּנִימִ֔י <S%H6442><s%> the inner וְהוֹצִיאַ֙נִי֙ <S%H3318><s%> he brought me forth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> whose prospect דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [is] toward הַקָּדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> the east וּמְדָד֖וֹ <S%H4058><s%> and measured סָבִ֥יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> it round about סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> around

מָדַ֛ד <S%H4058><s%> He measured ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> side הַקָּדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> the east בִּקְנֵ֣ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּ֑ה <S%H4060><s%> with the measuring חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> five [אֵמֹות כ] (מֵאֹ֥ות <S%H520><s%> cubit ק) קָנִ֛ים <S%H7070><s%> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּ֖ה <S%H4060><s%> with the measuring סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

מָדַ֖ד <S%H4058><s%> He measured ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> side הַצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> the north חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred קָנִ֛ים <S%H7070><s%> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּ֖ה <S%H4060><s%> with the measuring סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> side הַדָּר֖וֹם <S%H1864><s%> the south מָדָ֑ד <S%H4058><s%> He measured חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred קָנִ֖ים <S%H7070><s%> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּֽה׃ <S%H4060><s%> with the measuring

סָבַ֖ב <S%H5437><s%> He turned about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> side הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> to the west מָדַ֛ד <S%H4058><s%> [and] measured חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred קָנִ֖ים <S%H7070><s%> reeds בִּקְנֵ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> reed הַמִּדָּֽה׃ <S%H4060><s%> with the measuring

לְאַרְבַּ֨ע <S%H702><s%> it by the four רוּח֜וֹת <S%H7307><s%> sides מְדָד֗וֹ <S%H4058><s%> He measured ח֤וֹמָה <S%H2346><s%> it had a wall לוֹ֙ סָבִ֣יב ׀ <S%H5439><s%> round about סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> around אֹ֚רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [reeds] long חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְרֹ֖חַב <S%H7341><s%> broad חֲמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <S%H914><s%> to make a separation בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> between the sanctuary לְחֹֽל׃ <S%H2455><s%> and the profane place
